Title: Hera Pheri
Writer: Siddique (story), Lal (story), Neeraj Vora (dialogue), Neeraj Vora (screenplay), Anand S. Vardhan (story)
Actors: Akshay Kumar, Paresh Rawal, Sunil Shetty, Tabu
Plot: Three unemployed men find the answer to all their money problems when they recieve a call from a kidnapper. However, things do not go as planned.
